concept.title: User Management Enhancements
concept.shortdesc: Transfer user privileges, log in as a different user, and see who is logged in to Discover.

conbody.p: These features are available in Admin > User Management:
Log In as User: To support users, administrators can log in as a user.

Manage Discover Users: Administrators can see who is logged in to
Discover and terminate active sessions. See the New Features in Discover.
